name: Stack,Clack,Clock!
description:
Stack, Clack, Clock! is a game about stacking bricks, where players build a tower one brick at a time.

Features


Pick up and play
  • Just touch the screen or press a button to put a brick down and then build your tower.

Relaxing zen
  • Minimalist graphics, peaceful music and sound effects create a relaxing zen experience.

Put your mind to work
  • It starts simple with you building a small tower. But how do you get to 3500m without those falling blocks hitting your tower?

Endlessly replay-able
  • Play your way with different themes, play styles, environment set ups and difficulty to create a different experience each time you play.
